posts.post_content:
Interesting to dig around here searching on the term R&S. It would seem that the R&S baseball cards are actually published by Raphael Tuck & Sons, who did all sorts of similar "scraps" or "oblaten", as well as postcards, greeting cards, and other ephemera.

I am working my way through a scrapbook from 1891, and among some of the baseball cards from R&S (sic) are two boxers, both Heavyweights. Anyone ever seen these little guys?

Thanks,

Laura

[IMG]http://i469.photobucket.com/albums/rr56/KatyDidsCards/Heavya.jpg[/IMG]
